DOC.brief_summary: Magnetic resonance spectroscopy ( MRS ) allow non-invasive measurement concentration 18 metabolite brain ( `` neurochemical profile '' ) . The objective proposal develop new method high-field brain MRS ( 3 7 Tesla ) . Our main hypothesis higher magnetic field lead improve spatial temporal resolution improve quantification precision . Aims 1 . To obtain improved `` neurochemical profile '' brain use single voxel proton MRS high field ( 3 Tesla 7 Tesla ) . 2 . To develop new method proton magnetic resonance spectroscopic imaging ( MRSI ) obtain metabolic map high field ( 3 Tesla 7 Tesla ) . Since project focus technical development , healthy volunteer recruit ( patient ) .
